channel.title: bits & bytes on Dimitar Ralev
channel.description: Recent content in bits & bytes on Dimitar Ralev

item.title: Bookmarko - Learning by doing
item.description: Months before I started Tuesday(The WordPress theme), I was thinking about ideas for a serious project and most of the time the word that was coming to my mind was Bookmarking.

item.title: On making Tuesday from the second try
item.description: Short personal story I remember the day very clear. Previous night I decided to get up early, go to Costa Coffee, and start the project.

item.title: Simplexpenses - The battle of the frameworks
item.description: After the release of the early Bookmarko version, I started to look around for the next idea that would be interesting to be made and also to help me learn some new developer tools.
